message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $11000 for the product. Can we discuss a price of $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10000, but that's the maximum I can afford. Can we meet at $10000?

I appreciate your honesty about your budget, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $10500, but that's as low as I can go. I'm confident you'll find the product worth every penny.
